head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENE, LAWRENCE J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENE, LAWRENCE J.

block.p: GREENE-Lawrence J. Expert in contract and copyright law. Died July 6, 2000, after a brief illness. Contributions may be sent to Milton J. H. Grand Memorial Lecture Fund, Department of Pediatrics, Montefiore Medical Center, 111 E. 210 St, Bronx, NY 10467. Memorial service Riverside Chapel, 180 W. 76th St, Manhattan, Sunday, July 9, 11:15 AM.
